Hmm.  The archmage-cleric combination would be the most threatening 
to most people, whereas a soldier-archer combination wouldn't be as 
threatening.  However I am more scared of a slime-anything else 
combination for one reason: you could quickly raise up an army of high 
mobility characters.

2nd, I believe in restricting the making of halfings until both 
potential partners have reached experience level 20 or higher.  That's 
not going to be an easy task of getting two characters beyond 
experience level 20 (only way to get there far would be too go through 
 all the built-in scenarios, all the tevfifty, and then go through my 
scenarios to reach that point.)
